TimeLine.AddAbpVNextSeverProject: Prepare preliminary knowledge and add the Abp vNext basic service project
TimeLine.AddEmptyClientApp: Add an empty mobile client project
TimeLine.AddWPFManagerProject: Confirm that the server side is built using Abp vNext and add the WPF project
TimeLine.ClientAppBaseInfo: Obtain basic information of the mobile client
TimeLine.ClientAppCompleteContactRead: The mobile client has completed reading the contact data
TimeLine.ClientAppVersion1: The first version of the mobile client has come to an end, and other process modules will be developed
TimeLine.WPFManagerStructureOver: Build the initial version of the WPF management terminal to achieve dynamic theme color change, internationalization, localization, and Prism modularization
